name: XRInputSourceArray.length
description: The read-only length property returns an integer value indicating the number of items in the input source list represented by the XRInputSourceArray object.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The read-onlylengthproperty returns an integer value indicating the number of items in the input source list represented by theXRInputSourceArray object.
